title: 32 31 32 "The Thief With a Heart of Gold""Witch of Cocoyashi Village! Arlong's Female Leader!"Transliteration: "Kokoyashi Mura no Majo! Āron no On'nakanbu" (Japanese:ココヤシ村の魔女!アーロンの女幹部) Munehisa Sakai Michiru Shimada 213.1 July 19, 2000(2000-07-19)[61] April 30, 2005[62]
transformers_text:
32 31 32 "The Thief With a Heart of Gold""Witch of Cocoyashi Village! Arlong's Female Leader!"Transliteration: "Kokoyashi Mura no Majo! Āron no On'nakanbu" (Japanese:ココヤシ村の魔女!アーロンの女幹部) Munehisa Sakai Michiru Shimada 213.1 July 19, 2000(2000-07-19)[61] April 30, 2005[62]

Zoro is captured by the fishmen after Usopp and Johnny ditch him, and it's revealed that Nami was part of Arlong's crew the entire time. When a group of Fishmen attack Cocoyashi Village, Usopp comes to the rescue.
